name: zombie attack (DzDevStodio)
description:
my first game i hope you enjoy it 

Arrow keys or WASD to move, aim with your mouse. Click to shoot. Press 1 and 2 to switch between pistol and machine gun. Press P to open the shop. Press T to get 10 cash (for playtesting)
